Name: Fatal Blade
About the game: Synopsis Demons Take Human Form and Rule the Middle Ages, from which the warriors start hunting demons to reclaim their homeland... Game Play The ultimate control action game The moment you encounter a powerful foe, you will be engulfed in tension that will make your hands sweat. But don't worry. If you learn how to use various weapons and play a high level of control, all enemies in front of you will disappear. Attack and Defense Attacking is the best strategy in battle, but sometimes you can use the 'Fatal Blade' to defend and strike the enemy's weak points at once to destroy the enemy at once. The way you attack boss level enemies depends on how well you use this 'Fatal Blade'. Experience and Growth You can improve the warrior's abilities by collecting the demon souls obtained through various battles. A warrior's stamina and balance management will be very important factors in battle. Collect weapons and Items Increase your attack power by acquiring various items the enemy has through battle. If you look around carefully, you can get valuable items such as keys and potions that can unlock missions.
